sentence.Network_en: Reconciliation in relation to man and Propitiation in relation to God.
sentence.Network_cn: 世人与上帝和好,以及神所得着的安抚.

sentence.Network_en: His death was a sacrifice to God and a propitiation for the remission of sins.
sentence.Network_cn: 为众人之罪而死,成为众人的赎罪祭.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ⑵、挽回祭（propitiation）：这字和神有关→使神接受罪人。我们将试着避免使用艰深刻板的神学字眼、并且尽量以通俗的字眼和观 …
...架所获胜的救恩在新约圣经中还用了好多比喻词语，像是挽回（ProPitiation）、救赎（redemption）及和好（reconciliation）等字眼 …

propitiatory 安抚的propitious winds 顺风propitious 吉利的

Sinograma « 兆 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 征兆 zhēng zhào 吉兆[ good omen;propitious sign] 京兆[ capital].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin propitiatio(n-), from the verb propitiare (see propitiate)

means.word_mean: 1. the act of placating and overcoming distrust and animosity
2. the act of atoning for sin or wrongdoing (especially appeasing a deity)
